comments.author: ludovic@hirlimann.net
comments.creator: ludovic@hirlimann.net
comments.text: Donn did you search for an extension doing that ?

comments.raw_text: I am more than basically familiar with all of the versions of Thunderbird and have not seen a "Select All" type of BCC button while creating the address list on a "Write" mail .  As it is, I see only changing BCC on a address list going to be mailed by doing one line at a time or a repeat <enter> function.  This may be a configuration problem in /home/me/.thunderbird/me/pref.js.  If that is possible please let me know.
comments.author: n5xwb@comcast.net
